page.title: 19TRANSLATIONS (pages 5-8,15)
page.content: {CHURCHES (pages 5,6,7) {In Pwllheli there are 10 churches {4 Presbyterian (1 English),and one {each of Independant,Baptist,Wesleyan, {Anglican,Roman Catholic and Jehova {Witnesses.The Quakers meet once a {month.The English Presbyterian is the {only English church in Llyn Peninsula. {Membership of churches range from 35 {to 450.6 churches have Sunday Schools. SCHOOL CHILDREN-SUNDAY SCHOOLS (p.8) 52.5% of Pwllheli's primary school children attend Sunday School.Some of them sit Biblical Examinations, attend Singing Festivals and go on annual excursions. {SCHOOL WALKS (p.15) {Descriptive accounts of what the {children saw one afteroon in June. {They saw cygnets,harbour flood-gates, {Co-op trolley in the Harbour,birds {and insects. }
